Address.value: 1252 BORREGAS AVENUE, SUNNYVALE, California, 94089, United States

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: eGain Corp automates customer engagement with an innovative Software as a service (SaaS) platform, powered by deep digital, Artificial intelligence (AI), and knowledge capabilities. It operates in the United States, the United Kingdom, and India. The company derives most of its revenues from North America. It provides its products to industries such as financial services, telecommunications, retail, government, healthcare, and utilities.
